mapper.select: select distinct t_permission.permission_name from t_user join t_user_role on t_user.id=t_user_role.user_id join t_role on t_role.id=t_user_role.role_id join t_role_permission on t_role.id=t_role_permission.role_id join t_permission on t_role_permission.permission_id=t_permission.id where t_user.username=#{username}
